1455360.name: Vtuber Broadcast Tool Mac supported
1455360.description:
Virtual Studio supports video recording and also playing dubbing file with lipsync .

We also have other music video maker software for Vroid called DAN☆SING!


The features are summarized below
  • Create and upload your virtual character into the app
  • Control the character with only a webcam
  • Lip-sync with what you say
  • Media composition such as video/image insert
  • 1080P Video Export
  • Different poses and emotion supported
